lines: O HAPPY DAY! THAT FIXED MY CHOICE
1. Siku Lero Hlawuleka, Loko Ndzi Hlawula Yesu,
Mbilu Yanga Yi Tsakile, Yi Khapa Hi Wona Ntsako.
I Siku Ra Ntsako Loko Yesu A Ndzi Hlantswa,
A Tlhela A Ndzi Dyondzisa Ku Hanya Hi Ku Khongela I Siku Ra Ntsako Loko Yesu A Ndzi Hlantswa.
2. Sweswi Swi Hetisekile, Ndzi Wa Yona Hosi Yanga, A Ndzi Vita Ndzi Landzela,
3. Mbilu Yanga Wisa Sweswi, Eka Yesu Muponisi,
U Nga Suki Eka Hosi, Yi Na Vunene Hikwabyo.
4. Ndzi Hlambanyerile Tilo, Swi Ta Tshama Swi Ri Tano, Nkarhi Wu Kondza Wu Fika,
5. Siku Yesu A Nga Ta Ta, A Ta Na Tintsumi Takwe, Ndzi Pfuka Na Yona Hosi,
